mapper.insert: insert into be_qgf (id, rq, ydh, tpsl, hdf, fbf, jgcf, bgbjf, zf, bb, jyjyf, bgf, ldf, baf, hff, cyf, hj, czsj, pramid, hdfSm, fbfSm, jgcfSm, bgbjfSm, zfSm, bbSm, jyjyfSm, bgfSm, ldfSm, bafSm, hffSm, cyfSm ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tpsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jgcf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgbjf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyjyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pramid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hdfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jgcfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgbjfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bbSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyjyfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bafSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hffSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from be_qgf where pramid = ${pramid}
mapper.update: update be_qgf set rq = #{rq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ydh = #{ydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpsl = #{tpsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hdf = #{hdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbf = #{fbf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jgcf = #{jgcf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgbjf = #{bgbjf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zf = #{zf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bb = #{bb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jyjyf = #{jyjyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgf = #{bgf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ldf = #{ldf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baf = #{baf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hff = #{hff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cyf = #{cyf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hj = #{hj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czsj = #{czsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pramid = #{pramid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hdfSm = #{hdfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbfSm = #{fbfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jgcfSm = #{jgcfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgbjfSm = #{bgbjfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zfSm = #{zfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bbSm = #{bbSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jyjyfSm = #{jyjyfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bgfSm = #{bgfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ldfSm = #{ldfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bafSm = #{bafSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hffSm = #{hffSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cyfSm = #{cyfSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
